content:
That's great to hear! "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo" is a fantastic novel, and it's even more enjoyable when shared with a friend. Buddy-reading can add a whole new level of depth and excitement to the reading experience. It's wonderful that you're discussing the book with Emily and sharing your thoughts and opinions with each other.

Buddy-reading can also help you stay accountable, motivated, and engaged with the book. It's a great way to explore different perspectives and insights, and you might even discover new aspects of the story that you hadn't considered before.

If you're looking for more books to buddy-read with Emily, you could try some of the other debut novels I mentioned earlier. Alternatively, you could explore other genres or themes that you're both interested in. Whatever you choose, I hope you continue to have a blast discussing books with your friend!
